actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to establish the National Fab Lab Network, a nonprofit organization consisting of a national network of local digital fabrication facilities providing universal access to advanced manufacturing tools for workforce development, STEM education, developing inventions, creating businesses, producing personalized products, mitigating risks, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Fab Lab Network Act of 2024

titles.title: National Fab Lab Network Act of 2024
National Fab Lab Network Act of 2024

A bill to establish the National Fab Lab Network, a nonprofit organization consisting of a national network of local digital fabrication facilities providing universal access to advanced manufacturing tools for workforce development, STEM education, developing inventions, creating businesses, producing personalized products, mitigating risks, and for other purposes.
